#summary Method extraMaterialsForTypeName details

= /extraMaterialsForTypeName/(typeName) =

List of extra materials for given item typeName.

== Attributes ==
    
|| activityID || Number ||
|| activityName || String ||
|| damagePerJob || String ||
|| quantity || Number ||
|| requiredTypeCategoryID || Number ||
|| requiredTypeGroupID || String ||
|| requiredTypeGroupName || String ||
|| requiredTypeID || Number ||
|| requiredTypeIcon || String ||
|| requiredTypeName || String ||
